Nov. 30, 2003 D Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Set Test and Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-championship-section
Championship
The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
Butlins, Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Roy Newsome and Barry Thompson adjudicated the test-piece segment, on Saturday 29th November, while Roy Newsome and David Read adjudicated the entertainment segment, on Sunday 30th November. The compere for the entertainment was John Maines.
Soloist: Thoresby
Prizes: 1st: £5000, 2nd: £2000, 3rd: £1000, 4th: £500, 5th: £200
